title.rendered: Amber Roy Joins Triumph Business Capital As COO

content.rendered:
Chartwell Partners is pleased to announce that Amber Roy recently joined Triumph Business Capital as Chief Operating Officer.  In this role, Roy will be responsible for the day-to-day operations of Triumph Business Capital and related services ensuring the company delivers high quality services while being cost-effective and maintaining a positive profit margin. In partnership with the CEO and leadership team, Roy will develop and execute an operational strategy that will create an operating platform capable of scaling the business multiples times larger while removing points of friction for their customers.  Roy joins TBC from Caliber Home Loans, where she served as Senior Vice President, Executive Strategy / Chief of Staff for Operations and Servicing.

“Amber is a dynamic leader with a proven track record of leading strategy, operations and technology with best-in-class companies,” said Scott Petty, Managing Partner of Chartwell Partners’ Financial Services Practice.

 

About Triumph Business Capital

Triumph Business Capital is a wholly owned subsidiary of Triumph Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ: TBK), a financial holding company headquartered in Dallas, Texas, with a diversified line of community banking and commercial finance activities. The bank subsidiary, TBK Bank, SSB, is a Texas-state savings bank offering commercial and consumer banking products focused on meeting client needs in Texas, Colorado, Kansas, Iowa, Illinois, and New Mexico. Triumph Bancorp also offers insurance through Triumph Insurance Group, Inc and serves a national client base through its Triumph Commercial Finance division, which offers factoring, equipment lending, asset based lending, and premium finance solutions for independent insurance agents.

About Chartwell Partners

Chartwell Partners is a national, retained search firm founded in 2005 specializing in executive and board of director leadership recruitment. Partner Scott Petty and his team pride themselves on being one of the best executive search firm recruiting teams in the nation. They are regularly called upon by clients in the Commercial Banking, Community Banking and Real Estate Sectors to recruit C-Suite and other senior executives. Although national in scope, Chartwell Partners takes pride in offering a more highly engaged, personal experience for both clients and candidates throughout the executive recruitment process.
